text: Johannes Brink (29 April 1912 - 29 April 1976) was a Dutch swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Dutch male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of the Netherlands Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam Category:Male freestyle swimmers
title: Johannes Brink
